issues.description: The corpus contains only 2 documents (N=2). According to the v10.0 experiment specification, a sample size of N<4 is only suitable for 'Single case or comparative case analysis only' and cannot support any inferential statistical tests.
issues.impact: The experiment will execute and produce dimensional scores for the two documents, but no statistical analysis (e.g., t-tests, ANOVA) can be performed. The results will be limited to a simple qualitative comparison.
issues.fix: This setup is acceptable for the stated goal of minimal pipeline validation. If statistical analysis were intended, the corpus would need to be significantly expanded (e.g., N≥10 for descriptive statistics, N≥20 for limited inferential testing).
